divs: Sighting DetailsThis event occurred on 2102004 2004 is not an available option on the formabove, so I put 0000. I was driving east on 28 Mile Road, southeast ofRichmond, at night. While glancing out my drivers side window, I noticed abright greenish-yellow object in the sky. It was traveling in an arc towardsthe ground. In the first split-second, I thought it was a firework--but then Irealized it wasnt. The object was boomerang-shapedV-shaped with the bottom legappearing to be shorter than the top one. It was traveling with the point ofthe V at the front. I watched it for approximately 5 seconds until itdisappeared the light suddenly went out. There were no buildings or treesbehind which it could have vanished. I continued driving home and reported whatId seen to my daughter.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Richmond
There were no other sightings in Richmond on or around February 10th 2004
